11 Manipulator::Manipulator()
12 {
13  Manipulator::InitializeSummitXlPoses();
14  moveit::planning_interface::MoveGroupInterface::Options manipulator_options_(GROUP_NAME, ROBOT_DESCRIPTION, ros::NodeHandle());
15  manipulator_ = new moveit::planning_interface::MoveGroupInterface(manipulator_options_);
16  manipulator_->allowReplanning(true);
17 }

24 void Manipulator::init(ros::NodeHandle &node_handle)
25 {
26  node_handle_ = node_handle;
27 }

35 BT::NodeStatus Manipulator::GetNodeStatus(const char* name)
36 {
37  actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState state = manipulator_->getMoveGroupClient().getState();
38  if (state == actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState::SUCCEEDED)
39  {
40  ROS_DEBUG("[%s] reached Pose", name);
41  return BT::NodeStatus::SUCCESS;
42  }
43  else if (state == actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState::ACTIVE ||
44  state == actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState::PENDING ||
45  state == actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState::LOST)
46  {
47  ROS_DEBUG("[%s] moving to Pose", name);
48  return BT::NodeStatus::RUNNING;
49  }
50  else
51  {
52  ROS_ERROR("[%s] Failed to reach Pose!", name);
53  return BT::NodeStatus::FAILURE; // TBD --> ignore non-reachable poses just for now
54  }
55 }
56 
64 moveit::core::MoveItErrorCode Manipulator::MoveGripperToPregraspPose(geometry_msgs::PoseStamped &tomato_pose, float offset)
65 {
66 
67  manipulator_->setGoalPositionTolerance(MANIPULATOR_TOLERANCE_PREGRASP);
68  tf::TransformListener listener;
69 
70  listener.waitForTransform(BASE_FRAME, tomato_pose.header.frame_id, ros::Time(0), ros::Duration(3.0));
71 
72  moveit::planning_interface::MoveGroupInterface::Options manipulator_options_(GROUP_NAME, ROBOT_DESCRIPTION, ros::NodeHandle());
73  float y_offset = (tomato_pose.pose.position.y) < 0 ? 0.1 : -0.1;
74  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped tomato_base_footprint;
75  listener.transformPose(BASE_FRAME, tomato_pose, tomato_base_footprint);
76  tomato_base_footprint.pose.position.z += TCP_OFFSET_Z;
77  float angle = atan2(tomato_base_footprint.pose.position.y, tomato_base_footprint.pose.position.x);
78  tomato_base_footprint.pose.orientation = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(0, M_PI / 6, angle);
79 
80  tomato_base_footprint.pose.position.x -= cos(angle) * (offset+TCP_OFFSET_XY);
81  tomato_base_footprint.pose.position.y -= sin(angle) * (offset+TCP_OFFSET_XY);
82  manipulator_->setPoseReferenceFrame(tomato_base_footprint.header.frame_id);
83  manipulator_->setPoseTarget(tomato_base_footprint);
84  manipulator_->setPlanningTime(5);
85  return manipulator_->asyncMove();
86 }
87 
94 moveit::core::MoveItErrorCode Manipulator::MoveGripperToTomato(geometry_msgs::PoseStamped &tomato_pose)
95 {
96  manipulator_->setGoalPositionTolerance(MANIPULATOR_TOLERANCE_SMALL);
97  tf::TransformListener listener;
98  listener.waitForTransform(BASE_FRAME, tomato_pose.header.frame_id, ros::Time(0), ros::Duration(3.0));
99  moveit::planning_interface::MoveGroupInterface::Options manipulator_options_(GROUP_NAME, ROBOT_DESCRIPTION, ros::NodeHandle());
100  float y_offset = (tomato_pose.pose.position.y) < 0 ? 0.1 : -0.1;
101  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped tomato_base_footprint;
102  listener.transformPose(BASE_FRAME, tomato_pose, tomato_base_footprint);
103  float angle = atan2(tomato_base_footprint.pose.position.y, tomato_base_footprint.pose.position.x);
104  tomato_base_footprint.pose.position.x -= cos(angle) * TCP_OFFSET_XY;
105  tomato_base_footprint.pose.position.y -= sin(angle) * TCP_OFFSET_XY;
106  tomato_base_footprint.pose.position.z += TCP_OFFSET_Z;
107  tomato_base_footprint.pose.orientation = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(0, M_PI / 6, angle);
108  MoveLinear(tomato_base_footprint.pose, false);
109  return moveit::core::MoveItErrorCode::SUCCESS;
110 }
111 
119 double Manipulator::MoveLinear(geometry_msgs::Pose end_pose, bool check_collision)
120 {
121  std::vector<geometry_msgs::Pose> direction;
122  direction.push_back(end_pose);
123  manipulator_->setPoseReferenceFrame(BASE_FRAME);
124  moveit_msgs::RobotTrajectory trajectory;
125  double res = manipulator_->computeCartesianPath(direction, 0.01, 10, trajectory, check_collision);
126  if (res >= 0)
127  {
128  manipulator_->execute(trajectory);
129  }
130  return res;
131 }
132 
141 double Manipulator::MoveLinearVec(float x, float y, float z){
142  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped ee = manipulator_->getPoseTarget();
143  tf::TransformListener listener;
144  listener.waitForTransform(BASE_FRAME, ee.header.frame_id,ros::Time(0), ros::Duration(3));
145  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped ee_base_frame;
146  ee_base_frame.header.frame_id = BASE_FRAME;
147  listener.transformPose(BASE_FRAME, ee,ee_base_frame);
148  ee_base_frame.pose.position.x += x;
149  ee_base_frame.pose.position.y += y;
150  ee_base_frame.pose.position.z += z;
151  double res = MoveLinear(ee_base_frame.pose, false);
152  return res;
153 }
154 
160 moveit::core::MoveItErrorCode Manipulator::DropTomatoInBasket(void)
161 {
162  manipulator_->setGoalPositionTolerance(MANIPULATOR_TOLERANCE_LARGE);
163  manipulator_->setPoseReferenceFrame(BASE_FRAME);
164  manipulator_->setPoseTarget(drop_pose_);
165  manipulator_->setPlanningTime(30);
166  return manipulator_->move();
167 }

174 moveit::core::MoveItErrorCode Manipulator::MoveToInitialPosition(void)
175 {
176  manipulator_->setGoalJointTolerance(MANIPULATOR_JOINT_TOLERANCE);
177  manipulator_->setPoseReferenceFrame(BASE_FRAME);
178  manipulator_->setJointValueTarget(initial_position_);
179  manipulator_->setPlanningTime(30);
180  return manipulator_->move();
181 }

219 void Manipulator::InitializeSummitXlPoses()
220 {
221  Manipulator::InitializeInitialPose();
222  Manipulator::InitializeDrivingPose();
223  Manipulator::InitializeScanningPose();
224  Manipulator::InitializeDropPose();
225 }
226 
233 void Manipulator::InitializeInitialPose()
234 {
235  std::string yaml_file;
236  ros::param::get("arm_positions", yaml_file);
237  YAML::Node arm_positions = YAML::LoadFile(yaml_file);
238  std::vector<float> joint_angles = arm_positions["initial_joint_angles"].as<std::vector<float>>();
239 
240  initial_position_["arm_shoulder_pan_joint"]=ba_helper::ConvertDegreesToRadians(joint_angles[0]);
241  initial_position_["arm_shoulder_lift_joint"]=ba_helper::ConvertDegreesToRadians(joint_angles[1]);
242  initial_position_["arm_elbow_joint"]=ba_helper::ConvertDegreesToRadians(joint_angles[2]);
243  initial_position_["arm_wrist_1_joint"]=ba_helper::ConvertDegreesToRadians(joint_angles[3]);
244  initial_position_["arm_wrist_2_joint"]=ba_helper::ConvertDegreesToRadians(joint_angles[4]);
245  initial_position_["arm_wrist_3_joint"]=ba_helper::ConvertDegreesToRadians(joint_angles[5]);
246 }
247 
252 void Manipulator::InitializeDrivingPose()
253 {
254  std::string yaml_file;
255  ros::param::get("arm_positions", yaml_file);
256  YAML::Node arm_positions = YAML::LoadFile(yaml_file);
257  std::vector<float> joint_angles = arm_positions["driving_joint_angles"].as<std::vector<float>>();
258 
259  driving_position_["arm_shoulder_pan_joint"]=ba_helper::ConvertDegreesToRadians(joint_angles[0]);
260  driving_position_["arm_shoulder_lift_joint"]=ba_helper::ConvertDegreesToRadians(joint_angles[1]);
261  driving_position_["arm_elbow_joint"]=ba_helper::ConvertDegreesToRadians(joint_angles[2]);
262  driving_position_["arm_wrist_1_joint"]=ba_helper::ConvertDegreesToRadians(joint_angles[3]);
263  driving_position_["arm_wrist_2_joint"]=ba_helper::ConvertDegreesToRadians(joint_angles[4]);
264  driving_position_["arm_wrist_3_joint"]=ba_helper::ConvertDegreesToRadians(joint_angles[5]);
265 }

271 void Manipulator::InitializeScanningPose()
272 {
273  std::string yaml_file;
274  ros::param::get("arm_positions", yaml_file);
275  YAML::Node arm_positions = YAML::LoadFile(yaml_file);
276  std::vector<float> joint_angles = arm_positions["scan_position_joint_angles"].as<std::vector<float>>();
277 
278  scanning_position_["arm_shoulder_pan_joint"]=ba_helper::ConvertDegreesToRadians(joint_angles[0]);
279  scanning_position_["arm_shoulder_lift_joint"]=ba_helper::ConvertDegreesToRadians(joint_angles[1]);
280  scanning_position_["arm_elbow_joint"]=ba_helper::ConvertDegreesToRadians(joint_angles[2]);
281  scanning_position_["arm_wrist_1_joint"]=ba_helper::ConvertDegreesToRadians(joint_angles[3]);
282  scanning_position_["arm_wrist_2_joint"]=ba_helper::ConvertDegreesToRadians(joint_angles[4]);

290 void Manipulator::InitializeDropPose()
291 {
292  std::string yaml_file;
293  ros::param::get("arm_positions", yaml_file);
294  YAML::Node arm_positions = YAML::LoadFile(yaml_file);
295  std::vector<float> pose = arm_positions["dropping_position"].as<std::vector<float>>();
296 
297  drop_pose_.header.frame_id = BASE_FRAME;
298  drop_pose_.pose.orientation = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(ba_helper::ConvertDegreesToRadians(pose[3]), ba_helper::ConvertDegreesToRadians(pose[4]), ba_helper::ConvertDegreesToRadians(pose[5]));
299  drop_pose_.pose.position.x = pose[0];
300  drop_pose_.pose.position.y = pose[1];
301  drop_pose_.pose.position.z = pose[2];
302 }
